description: Provide seamless access to Gmail functionalities including email sending, retrieval, label and thread management, and mailbox settings through a standardized interface. Enable secure OAuth2 authentication for personalized user access and support comprehensive Gmail API features. Simplify email management workflows by integrating Gmail capabilities into your applications or agents.

CLIENT_ID.description: CLIENT_ID - OAuth2 client ID (required for remote server)

CLIENT_SECRET.description: CLIENT_SECRET - OAuth2 client Secret (required for remote server)

REFRESH_TOKEN.description: REFRESH_TOKEN - OAuth2 refresh token (required for remote server)

configSchema.description: The CLIENT_ID, CLIENT_SECRET, and REFRESH_TOKEN are required for remote server usage.
